dt.t: I can't see {it}a thing{/it} without my glasses on.
The guests will be here soon, and I don't have {it}a thing{/it} (that is appropriate) to wear.
Don't worry about {it}a thing{/it}. I'll take care of everything.
She doesn't look {phrase}a thing like{/phrase} her older sister.
His new album doesn't sound {phrase}a thing like{/phrase} his last one.
